directions: In a saucepan, combine the first five ingredients. Stirring as it warms to dissolve the honey, bring the water to a boil, then lower heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Strain mixture through a fine sieve into another saucepan. Stir in the grapefruit juice and reheat slowly. Serve warm in mugs.
title: Mulled Grapefruit Juice
